title: Loving Hut Denpasar
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Asian, Indonesian
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Uses mostly organic vegetables and rice. Closed on Nyepi, one day before Nyepi and Galungan.
streetAddress: Pertokoan Sudirman Agung B-12A, Jl. PB Sudirman, Denpasar
